name: backupguard-pro
description: Sistema de Monitoreo y GestiÃ³n de Copias de Seguridad Automatizado

scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev:gateway" "npm run dev:services" "npm run dev:frontend"
scripts.dev:services: concurrently "npm run dev:user" "npm run dev:backup" "npm run dev:notification"
scripts.build: npm run build:services && npm run build:frontends
scripts.build:services: concurrently "npm run build:gateway" "npm run build:user" "npm run build:backup" "npm run build:notification"
scripts.test: npm run test:services && npm run test:frontends
scripts.test:services: concurrently "npm run test:user" "npm run test:backup" "npm run test:notification"
scripts.test:coverage: npm run test && npm run coverage:merge
scripts.coverage:merge: nyc merge coverage/services coverage/frontends && nyc report --reporter=html
scripts.install:all: npm install && npm run install:services && npm run install:frontends && npm run install:tests
scripts.install:services: concurrently "cd services/api-gateway && npm install" "cd services/user-service && npm install" "cd services/backup-monitor-service && npm install" "cd services/notification-service && npm install" "cd services/report-service && npm install" "cd services/config-service && npm install"
scripts.install:frontends: concurrently "cd frontends/admin-dashboard && npm install" "cd frontends/user-portal && npm install" "cd frontends/installer-app && npm install"
scripts.install:tests: concurrently "cd tests/integration && npm install" "cd tests/e2e && npm install"
scripts.start:prod: NODE_ENV=production concurrently "npm run start:gateway" "npm run start:services"
scripts.start:services: concurrently "npm run start:user" "npm run start:backup" "npm run start:notification"
